task.title: Imprint
task.shortdesc: You can create a new face of a solid face by executing imprinting operation. The following objects can be imprinted: arc, circle, line, 2D/3D polyline, ellipse, spline, region, 3D solid. To ensure the imprinting successfully, the objects to be imprinted must be intersected with one or more faces. For example, when a rectangular intersects with a 3D solid, you can imprint the intersecting curve. Then determine whether the original objects are removed or not.

step.cmd: Choose Modify > Solids Editing > Imprint from the main menu.
Select the solid object you want to imprint.
Select the object you want to imprint on the solid.
